nodes.text: This OOM command battle droid was serving as a commander for the Separatist Droid Army during the Battle of Teth.

During the Battle of Teth in 22 BBY, a separatist ground team under Asajj Ventress tried to retake a B'omarr Order Monastery that was captured by Republic forces. After storming an entrance and killing most of the clones that were present, this OOM command battle droid was assigned to eliminate the rest of the clones while Ventress would go take on the Jedi Anakin Skywalker. He was then ordered to seal the main gate and all portals, so nothing could escape the monastery. However, after affirming the command, he was shot in the head by Clone Captain Rex, who survived the attack, after which Ventress snatched the blaster from Rex and captured him.
